items.whoIAm: i'm a software engineer based out of Phoenix, Arizona.
items.whatIDo: i'm passionately building products to connect, engage, empower, and inspire.

items.reachMe: you can reach me on Twitter @KolyaVenturi or drop me a line at me@kolya.co
